data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Zeqing Niu, Feng Yuan, Pia Oremek, Feng Liu, Chaodong Zhu (2016): Thrinchostoma Saussure, little known bee genus from China, with description of a new species (Hymenoptera: Halictidae). Zoological Systematics 41 (2): 207-215, DOI: 10.11865/zs.201619
